Docs.param: The class type that is loadable
The argument type that the constructor takes (may be null)

The name to use when presenting a list to users
The names that can be used to load the class, for example, from a command line
Docs.summary: Assembly attribute used to specify that a class is loadable by a machine learning host enviroment, such as TLC
